english.segment1: This view has got to change. So let's skip town, let's go away. Who knows where?. Let's quit our jobs today. What would we do?. Where would we stay?. I don't care
english.segment2: We're young and so in love. We'll be together, so let's go. Let's go away
english.segment3: So let's just go tonight. Just you and me, we'll be alright. Have some fun. Waiting for me to say. Let's go to Californ-i-a. In the sun
english.segment4: We're young and so in love. We'll be together, so let's go. Let's go away
english.segment5: Darling, darling let's go. We'll feel the wind on our face. Darling, darling I know. I feel it, too. So let's storm the castles. And all the places we never knew. Just as long as you're there with me
english.segment6: We're young and so in love. We'll be together, so let's go. Let's go away
